main.description: Send an encrypted message to an MLS conversation

msgId.description: Client-generated ULID for message deduplication. MUST be included in MLS message AAD.

idempotencyKey.description: Deprecated: Use msgId instead. Client-generated UUID for idempotent request retries.

ciphertext.description: MLS encrypted message ciphertext bytes (MUST be padded to paddedSize)

epoch.description: MLS epoch number when message was encrypted

declaredSize.description: Original plaintext size before padding (for metadata privacy)

paddedSize.description: Padded ciphertext size in bytes. Must be 512, 1024, 2048, 4096, 8192, or multiples of 8192 up to 10MB.

receivedAt.description: Server timestamp when message was received

errors.name: NotMember
errors.description: Caller is not a member of the conversation

errors.name: InvalidAsset
errors.description: Payload or attachment pointer is invalid

errors.name: EpochMismatch
errors.description: Message epoch does not match current conversation epoch
